name: Carla L Walker-Smith
text: This location is great. The staff is always friendly and courteous. When I had a wrong order they corrected it right away, even let me keep the wrong order and kept it warm while I waited. When my order was complete they brought it to my car. They always go above and beyond.

name: D T
text: Last minute decision to order pizza to eat in the park while enjoying the summer music series. Excellent customer service and nice sturdy paper plates and absorbent napkins. The pizza was good and just what was ordered

name: Greg Rodi
text: I ordered online for a "Scheduled later" delivery time.  When it did not appear correct on the online order, I called the store and spoke to an employee who confirmed the delivery would be made at the scheduled time which was 2.5 hours …More

name: kristopher santin
text: These guys were awesome. Had a pizza party for our football team and the guys at pizza hut gave us a great deal and the food was really good.

text: it was very easy the website works great, the food was good, and arrived on time

text: The young man who works Sunday is sweet, polite and has GREAT customer service skills, plus he makes a great pizza!

text: Great staff, very friendly and take pride in their work. Thanks !

name: Virginia and Dave Graham
text: Pizza was good came out on time employee's were friendly

name: Alisha Dye
text: We had Pizza Delivery for an event I was hosting in Aurora. The GM went above and beyond for my order. I am very impressed with this location and will refer everyone I know to them for their events! I wasn't to sure about the pasta but it was AMAZING! Everyone loved the food. Great Job!! I am sure you don't hear that enough!

name: jkontrad
text: I had the new hand-tossed with pepperoni and it was the best pizza I've had in a LONG time.  I also tried the spicy BBQ wings for the first time and they were equally good.  I need more of that sauce! …More

name: Daniel Mellum
text: Pizza's here are pretty good, but wife and I have become sick from the food from there twice now. First time was over 3 months ago and we though it was a one time fluke, but the same happened a week ago. Never happened with all other pizza places in the area. 1+ star: was a pretty tasty pizza, 1+ start I'm still alive! 2 starts!

name: bob vaughan
text: Best pizza joint around!!! Customer service is great!!

name: Teresa Lincoln
text: The absolute worst pizza we have ever ate and believe me we have had tons of them. Never again

text: We ordered a pizza for delivery and after nearly 2 hours of waiting we called to find out where it was. We called three times with no answer. Finally, my fiance called corporate who finally got through to the store. We were told the pizza …More

text: Pizza was good but the stuffed garlic knots were definitely not cooked all the way. They were very dough-y for a lack of a better word.
